boardgame.name: Unfair
boardgame.description: Build the city_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s greatest theme park, whatever it takes!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mix your favourite themes, from Pirate, Robot, Vampire, Jungle, Ninja, and Gangster. Build attractions and upgrade them to match blueprints, stack up towering rides, or simply make the most cash._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But watch out - your competitors may pay off the safety inspectors to close your rides or hire hooligans to vandalise your park! How will you get revenge?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Whatever happens, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s bound to be Unfair._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Over the course of 8 rounds, you play Event cards to help yourself and hinder your opponents, build Attractions and Upgrades using Park cards, and match your park to Blueprints._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Your goal is to build the highest-scoring park at game end, using three main ways to score:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; building your park to match Blueprints_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; building impressively tall Attractions with lots of Upgrades_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; buying your way to victory with good old fashioned cash_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You might hire staff to help you, or build a Super Attraction with a unique ability. Bribing officials and blackmailing politicians is also possible, but entirely optional._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

This copy of Unfair was purchased through Kickstarter and includes all original stretch goals and theme pack expansions (https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1960349413/unfair?ref=nav_search). For those familiar with the kickstarter, some copies had incorrectly sized cards (they were cut a little short). To fix this problem, an ENTIRE new set of (correctly sized) theme-pack cards and kickstarter promos were sent out. I never opened these (see pictures). The replacement cards remain in their original plastic wrap (promos arrived in a ziplock baggie). The game itself was opened, punched, and played once. All components are complete and in like new condition. See pictures below. Buyer will be responsible for postage. Upon request, postage will be approximated (based on your zip code) at USPS website. I will do my best to keep shipping costs low (I have no intention of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;making money_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; off the shipping). I cannot make promises for the post office, but I will pack everything as best I can to avoid any damage to the components in transit. If you have any questions, please feel free to geekmail.
Opened, never played FREE SHIPPING to United States only For international ask if interested
